tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE food_consumption (
  food_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  food_name VARCHAR(255),
  food_category VARCHAR(50),
  consumption_rate DECIMAL(5,2),
  consumption_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE FoodConsumption (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    food_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    consumption_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE FoodConsumptionPatterns (
  userID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  foodID INT NOT NULL,
  quantity INT,
  dateConsumed DATE
)

CREATE TABLE FoodItems (
  foodID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  itemName VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  category VARCHAR(50),
  calories INT
)

CREATE TABLE ConsumptionTrends (
  trendID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trendName VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  startDate DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ProductionPlanning (
  planID INT PRIMARY KEY,
  planName VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  productionGoal INT,
  deadline DATE
)
